modalFirstTime.title: Where does this number come from?
modalFirstTime.description: Internal research showed that on average 40% of our users made the first donation of their lives through Ribon's plataform.

modalFee.title: How Ribon’s fee works
modalFee.description: Your gift is either 100% donated or boosted before being donated (we only charge a 10% fee on the added value).
